bike.description: Fuji Altair 2 alloy custom butted and aero shaped, Integrated Head Tube, Double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji Altair 2 alloy butted aero seat stays with shaped ride tuned Energy Transfer Chainstay, Fuji forged road dropout with replaceable derailleur hanger,

components.description: FSA Gossamer MegaExo w/ Integrated Spindle, 39/53T Chainring
Tektro R-570 Dual Pivot w/Cartridge pads
Tange IS-24, 1 1/8" Integrated Road, with convex hollow alloy 25mm spacer
FC-990 Fuji Bonded Aero Carbon w/1 1/8" Cro-Mo Steerer
NEW Shimano Tiagra shifter/brake, 18-speed Flight Deck compatible
Fuji ProLite Forged Road, 1 1/8" threadless, +/-6 Degree
